name: VideoHole: Episode II
storyline:
Look where your inability to leave well enough alone has gotten us all. What started as an innocent day of general slacking, resistance collusion, and commercial espionage has somehow devolved into a cross dimensional odyssey with the lives of all your friends (and some of your foes) on the line!

In the mysterious depths of the videohole, reality is warped, memories are twisted, and the very nature of past events is obscured in literally the most inconvenient way possible. Cosmic gods (some malevolent even!) haunt and hamper your every attempt to save your dearest homies from their purgatorial fate. But you’re not gonna let that stop you, because you love them!

Right?
summary: Fall down further. Find them where they have always been. Help them remember. Explore multiple worlds, solve mysteries, and set your retail-hardened will against a mysterious cosmic force in the second installment of the beloved videohole series.
